7.1. glofrim.Glofrim.initialize_config

Quick search

7. GLOFRIM code documentationÂ¶

Glofrim.initialize_config Initializing the model configuration file; aligning GLOFRIM specifications for coupled runs to be consistent with overall run settings; with environment file (env-file) local paths to model engines can be defined
Glofrim.set_exchanges Defines the variable exchanges between models together with necessary unit and time conversions; exchanges can be defined in ini/env-file; it is important that all fluxes/states in ini/env-file are to m3 for mass balance.
Glofrim.initialize_model Initializes the model, i.e.
